{{Wired embedded system |brand=CyberSecurity |model=Recon Sentinel |revision=RECON1 |upc=866387000305 |asin=B078K27C7N |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Pine64 |manuf_model=Rock64 |manuf_rev=1GB |price=149 |est_release_date=July 2018 |type=network security platform, single-board computer |pwr_v=3 |pwr_amp=5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=3.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=1.35 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Rockchip |cpu1_model=RK3328 |cpu1_cspeed=1.5 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=GigaDevice |fla1_model=GD25Q127CSIG |fla2=16 GiB |fla2_brand=SanDisk |fla2_model=Ultra |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=SpecTek |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0, eMMC module connector |expansion_usb_num=3 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211F |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Stereo Line Driver w/ Adjustable Gain;SG Micro;SGM89000;;1;,,, Remote 8-bit I/O Expander for I2C-bus;NXP;PCF8574AT;;1;,,, Power Management IC w/RTC;Rockchip;RK805-1;;1; |flags=LCD display, GPIO, RTC |stock_boot=U-Boot; |stock_os=Linux;4.4.47;Ubuntu 16.04; }} {{TagLine|RECON SENTINEL Online Security}} :[https://www.reconsentinel.com/pages/docs/User_Guide.pdf User Guide]{{â€¢}}[https://www.reconsentinel.com/pages/docs/Quick_Start_Guide.pdf Quick Start Guide]
:''CyberSecurity Defense Solutions'' (''Cigent Technology'')
Device is a Pine64 [[PINE ROCK64 (4GB)|ROCK64 1GB]] unit with an attached ''QAPASS'' 1602 LCD.
*[https://hackaday.com/2020/11/16/teardown-recon-sentinel/ ''Recon Sentinel'' Teardown on '''Hack a Day'''] (November 16, 2020)
